column2: Saying that today is gloomy is a fallacy and subject to ambiguity.
Sometimes in life it's not about winning.
I played with fire and I burnt myself.
The search for meaning can give meaning even when there is no meaning to be found.
We're not in control, daemons are. We could try to  make a difference but that's bullshit. Intentions are irrelevant. They don't drive us. Daemons do.
Today feels good with a pinch of salt. These diagrams are full of holes and incoherent.
